blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary:
impermanence - reservations now open!

 imperamence is a laidback, member driven marauders era rp coming soon to jcink! we...
caption:
impermanence - reservations now open!

imperamence is a laidback, member driven marauders era rp coming soon to jcink! we feature a true shipper application that promotes good plotting, no word count, and relaxed activity rules. our aim is to foster a creative and welcoming community that allows us to write our own stories.

our discord opens friday the 19th, and the site opens sunday the 21st!

the plot ● the reservations ● the previews

title: Heroes and Villains
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IxuJTV

by punkysirius

Stand or fall I know there
Shall be peace in the valley
And it’s all an affair
Of my life with the heroes and villains

The events and aftermath of Sirius running away.

Words: 1902, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Years of Wolfstar’s Life

  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Orion Black, Walburga Black, James Potter
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: Running Away, Angst, Violence, homophobic violence, Recreational Drug Use, Child Abuse

blog.name: heizaissearchingjacob
blog.title: Oh Hey I’m Heiza
blog.description:
and if i don’t feel like a lazy potato, i’ll post drawings sometimes. Oh, i’m obsessed with HPHM and i’m an amazing Gryffindor student who hates side quests ‘cause i always waist my time and i never end them. I’m in year four because i forgot the game for a while. Oh my mc’s name is Isabelle Rose Beaumont and i’ve got a crup named Chickwing. Why is it called like that? I don’t know.
i'm italian, so ciao pizza berlusconi.

body:
Dear JK Rowling,

Has Italian witches and wizards got a wizarding school, like Hogwarts or Beauxbatons? Because I don’t speak French, I’m sorry. If anyone knows something about that, please tell me. IT’S AN EXISTENTIAL QUESTION, I NEED TO KNOW.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: toujourspur12
blog.title: 12 Grimmauld Place
blog.description: The Noble and Most Ancient House of Black ✦ little flights of fantasy based on hp for my pure entertainment ✦basically operate in AU Regulus lives, Sirius reconciles with his family because well I just like that idea too much and want them to be happy

tags: the noble and most ancient house of black
summary: Legacy Chapter 1, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
title: Legacy Chapter 1, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
excerpt: Walburga Black prided herself on being a woman of excellent breeding, taste, and talent. Thirty and unmarried, she decides if she wasn't fated for a husband and home, then she'd have glory instead. Pity her cousin didn't see the brilliance of her plan for entering a tournament. But he was a stupid, silly, flirt anyways. He couldn't duel his way out of a paper bag.
description:
A year ago or so I accidentally stumbled upon this story - I think it’s actually the very first Orion/Walburga story I’ve ever read . My current interest in HP is basically the renaissance of my 2003-2005 obsession (yep so many years ago and not a child anymore) and I guess now I am more inclined to read AUs and something other than hp original variations. Now I’ve drifted from the main characters pretty far away. 

I can actually write a seminal treatise about why  Orion/Walburga pairing is so appealing but maybe next time - so just sharing the good story. It has some minor canon-noncompliant details (order of succession) but still is a very good reading - and you can imagine how few stories (where they are not bloodthirsty monsters) we have in this part of fandom. 

 NB it’s hopelessly unfinished but still…

UPD not “hopelessly anfinished” at all. It was updated.

summary: muggle in DADA (defense against the dark arts)
title: muggle in DADA (defense against the dark arts)
body:
Lupin: A boggart turns into the worst fear of the person in front of it.

Lupin: Think of something that you find truly funny once it is unleashed. Let it take over all your thoughts and then say “Ridikkulus” very clearly!

Muggle, under breath: fuck

Lupin: You’re up!

Boggart turns into Thanos

Muggle student, nervously waving wand: Riddikulus!

Thanos turns into a grape

Whole class: what the absolute fuck.
